page.title: 07FISHING
page.content:
{
Fishing activities continue throughout most of the year in Ulley Reservoir.A variety of fish can be caught these include Rainbow Trout,Brown Trout,Roach, Rudd and Pike. During the Summer months when the daylight hours are longer permit fishing lasts between the hours of 7.00a.m. and 10.00p.m.During the shorter daylight hours of the Winter months fishing is restricted to 8.00a.m.to 4.00p.m.The fishing facilities are open to the general public and tickets can be purchased from a machine in the car park.The cost is Â£2.50 for a full day and Â£1.50 for half a day.
